item.title: Changing max cb n skillz lvl
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

search reture 0;
or return #;
change th # to your max level currently
after searching a few time you will see a part that loks lke this

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0;
edit the 99 or whatever you max level is there and the return #; to what you want you max skill lvl to be.

i aitn sure about editing max combat yet :\

Read full topic
